column5: WELL THIS WEEKEND AND ITS TIME TO GET SOME PRACTICE IN FOR THE TOURNEYS!!! BUT IM STILL TYIN MY TROUT KNOT WITH BRAIDED LINE!!! DONT WORK VERY WELL!!! ANYONE HAVE A LINK FOR STEP BY STEP ON THE PROPER KNOT FOR BRAIDED LINE??? PLEASE AND TY
Google Uni knot and Palomar knot
Palomer knot is easier the tieing you're shoes  G
another vote for palomar knot, I have never had a knot tied with power pro come out using that knot.
palomar is what i use for braid....not to mention every other line as well...easiest and hard to screw up
++++++1  Polomar .... Our 11 yr old ties it

Palomar all the way.  Was the first knot my Dad taught me, used it for years even before I knew what it was called. Learn the palomar, uni and uni-to-uni and your pretty much covered your fishing needs. I don't have any pics though, sorry.
I think your knot questions has been answered lol, so I will just add a "good fishes" to you this summer, look forward to seeing some pictures and reports!
Palomar knot.I will agree. Just remember to leave a bit of a tag.
